name: Paranautical Activity
overview: Old-school FPS action with a roguelite twist Paranautical Activity is a blisteringly-fast first-person shooter that combines classic arena-style FPS action with roguelite elements. An intense and challenging test of precision, skill and reflexes awaits! Key Features Unique FPS/Roguelite combination Procedurally generated levels Insanely fast gameplay Hidden levels Over 100 items 40+ enemies Ridiculous bosses Kick-ass dub-step soundtrack.
